text: Diane von Fürstenberg (born Diane Simone Michele Halfin; 31 December 1946) is a Belgian fashion designer. She is best known for her wrap dress. She became well known in 1969 when she married Prince Egon von Fürstenberg. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian businesspeople Category:Fashion designers Category:Writers from Brussels
title: Diane von Fürstenberg
